revised_title: Investigation of Arterial and Venous Wall Properties and Post-Mortem Contraction
tldr: This study investigates the properties of arterial and venous walls, focusing on post-mortem contraction and its effects on blood vessel distensibility, elasticity, and response to temperature changes. The research highlights the importance of considering the presence or absence of post-mortem contraction in experimental results and its impact on understanding arterial behavior.
